newsitem.title: USA: Technitrol adopts shareholder rights plan.
newsitem.headline: Technitrol adopts shareholder rights plan.

text.p: Technitrol Inc said on Friday its directors adopted a shareholder rights plant to protect shareholders from unfair takeover tactics.
The company said it knows of no pending or contemplated transaction that would require use of the rights.

The rights, which will enable holders to buy common stock, will be issued September 9 as a dividend to shareholders of record at the close of business on that date, when the rights attach to the shares, Technitrol said.
The rights go into effect if a person or group acquires 15 percent or more of the company's common stock or if a tender offer is announced for that amount, Technitrol said.
